title: Halfway Lost 2
content:
[[include theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include theme:the-coalition-theme]]

[[module css]]
@import url('https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Nothing+You+Could+Do&display=swap');

.box{
    border: 1px dashed #cdcdcd;
    background-color: #f5f5f5;
    padding: 15px;
    margin: 20px 0;
}

.log{
    border: none
    background-color: #fcfcfc;
    padding: 15px;
    margin: 20px 0;
    box-shadow : 0 0 7px rgba(0 , 0 , 0 , 0.3);
}

.page {
    display: block;
    overflow: hidden;
    background-attachment: scroll;
    background-clip: border-box;
    background-color: transparent;
    background-image: linear-gradient(to top ,rgb(173, 216, 230) 0%, rgb(240, 230, 140) 8%);
    background-origin: padding-box;
    background-position: 0px 8px;
    background-repeat: repeat;
    background-size: 100% 20px;

    border: 1px solid #CCC;
    padding: 10px 10px;
    margin-bottom: 10px;
    box-shadow : 0 0 7px rgba(0 , 0 , 0 , 0.3);
    }
.page p {
    line-height: 20px;
    margin: 0;
    font-size: 150%
}
[[/module]]

[[div class="box"]]
[[size 140%]]###2c4a78|--**"Comma"**--##[[/size]]
Personnel ID: **43975095/280**

Real Name: **Jaiden Sheridan Collins**
Nationality: **American**
Sex: **Female**
Date of Birth: **8/16/1996**

[[div class="page"]]
@@ @@

[[f>image jaiden.png width="300px"]]

[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]She's 27 today. Or, at least, according to the Coalition, when they confiscated her from her "threat entity" mother. I guess that's why birthdays never really struck a chord with her.[[/span]]
@@ @@
[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]Her callsign was Comma, because she always had something to say — usually along the lines of "sure, but why?" Drove command up the wall, but, now that I think about it, I wonder why I didn't ask more questions myself.[[/span]]
@@ @@
[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]I've finally got one now: where are you, Jai?[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[size 125%]]Summary[[/size]]
Missions-oriented, highly skilled special reconnaissance operative, proficient in stealth operations and improvisational combat. Extremely casual demeanor and particularly talkative, but intensely focused during operations and exceptionally loyal. Notably accelerated reaction time and excellent sensory awareness. Particularly close with team members --"Medusa"--, --"Lynx"--, --"2N"--, and "Sparks".

[[div class="page"]]
[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]"Close" is exactly how I'd expect them to put it. It doesn't half describe it, but at the same time, I don't know how I'd put it, either. I mean, going through hell and back again really makes you cling to those you've got, even when they're long gone.[[/span]]
@@ @@
[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]She watched Glenn die in her arms, but at least she was there for him until the very end. I'd never forgive myself if I couldn't do the same for her. [[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[size 120%]]Career Service Vitae[[/size]]
||**4/27/2020**||Completed Reconnaissance and Scouting Advanced Course. Recruited into PHYSICS Division and assigned to Assessment Team 280 "Quicksilver".||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**7/11/2020**||Assigned to reconnaissance mission AR-5117 with Assessment Team 280 "Quicksilver". Threat entity successfully identified and liquidated with minimal casualties.||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**[CLASSIFIED]**||[CLASSIFIED]||
||**7/22/2023**||Individually assigned to Operation "Sanguine Jupiter" as reconnaissance operative.||
||**7/28/2023**||Contact lost. Personnel presumed KIA.||
[[/div]]

[[div class="box"]]
[[size 140%]]###2c4a78|**"Sanguine Jupiter"**##[[/size]]
Operation #: **IV-3573**

[[size 120%]]Summary[[/size]]
Primary mission objective constitutes discovery of the origin of the threat entity. Undercover personnel are to infiltrate criminal operations and trace black market connections to the initial source providing KTE-3573-Ether-Florence.

[[div class="log"]]
[[size 140%]]###2c4a78|**KTE-3573-Ether-Florentine**##[[/size]]
Authorized Response Level: ###2c4a78|**2**## **(Sub-Moderate Threat)**

[[size 120%]]Description[[/size]]
[*http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-3573 KTE-3573-Ether-Florentine] is an anomalous substance similar to red wine. Threat entity possesses various alchemical and thaumaturgic properties, most notably in the //magnum opus//. Due to its paranormal applications, possession is strictly limited to authorized Coalition personnel, and any discovered instances are to be seized and contained immediately.

KTE-3573 originates from an extradimensional municipality commonly known as [*http://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-2264 Alagadda.]  However, due to a requirement for various alchemical components, including KTE-3573, in generating a Way to Alagadda, it is unknown how the substance initially entered distribution. The leading theory, proposed by Dr. Calixto Narváez, presumes an unknown and potentially hostile entity initially generated a Way from within Alagadda, through which the substance was transported.
[[/div]]

Mission does not entail seizure of undocumented threat entity supplies and/or detainment of associated criminals. Following initial reconnaissance mission, appropriate responses are to be executed by specialized Strike Teams and regional Coalition enforcers. In order to prevent disclosure of operatives' Coalition affiliation, each region is to be assigned exactly one operative, and operatives are to attempt contact with Coalition command only regarding significant developments.

[[div class="page"]]
[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]Whenever the Coalition rolls out a sting operation, they always start off with the three largest Free Ports — Three Portlands, Backdoor SoHo, and Eurtec. Of course, Portlands has the largest human population and SoHo has the most stable economy. [[/span]]
@@ @@
[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]As for Eurtec, the field manual puts it best.[[/span]]
[[/div]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="log"]]


[[size 140%]]###2c4a78|**Eurtec**##[[/size]]
Location Class: **Free Port**

[[size 120%]]Description[[/size]]
Eurtec is the prime technological metropolis of the west and the leading European Free Port. Originally founded by the Servants of Silicon Nornir, following their addition to the Council of 108 in 1984, administration of Eurtec was promptly transferred to the Coalition.

Eurtec is notable for its expansive criminal underground, which primarily reside in the lower city. Lower city residents are significantly more likely to possess paranormal properties and participate in blue market commerce[[footnote]]Commerce involving parascientific goods or service, usually thaumaturgy or alchemy.[[/footnote]], and many are known to be involved with anomalous substances and unregulated technologies. Coalition Enforcers are to engage known criminals on-sight but limit interaction with other paranormal individuals as outlined in the 1984 Coalition Administration Agreement.

The section of the city 600 meters above sea level or higher is officially designated the upper city. The upper city operates as the de facto capital of the Council of 108, and houses both the regional Coalition headquarters and the modern Council Assembly building.

[[footnoteblock]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="page"]]
[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]Last one. Managed to swipe this one before they changed the access codes...not that it's much help, but it's got sentimental value.[[/span]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="box"]]
[[size 140%]]###2c4a78|--**"Sparks"**--##[[/size]]
Serial #: **53095712/280**

Real Name: **Adrian Elliot Ross**
Nationality: **American**
Sex: **Male**
Date of Birth: **7/22/1995**

[[/div]]

[[div class="page"]]
[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]They've got eyes everywhere looking for me, and here I am marching onto their front lawn.[[/span]]
@@ @@
[[span style="font-family: 'Nothing You Could Do' ;"]]God, the things I do for Jai.[[/span]]
[[/div]]
author: JakdragonX
